page.title: 03HAYWARDS HEATH POLICE
page.content: HAYWARDS HEATH POLICE THE HAYWARDS HEATH POLICE ARE PART OF THE MID SUSSEX POLICE FORCE .THEY HAVE BEEN SET UP IN HAYWARDS HEATH FOR 98 YEARS. THE BUILDING HAS ALWAYS BEEN A POLICE STATION. THE HAYWARDS MHEATH STATION IS A SUB ONE, BURGESS HILL IS THE MAIN ONEFOR MID SUSSEX. THERE ARE NOT MANY POLICE DOGS IN HAYWARDS HEATH. THEY HAVE 46 CIVILIAN, 24 CONSTABLES.4 SERGEANTS ,2 INSPECTORS, 1 CHIEF SUPER INTENDANT AND 1 POLICE WOMAN. THE QUALIFICATIONS NEEDED TO BE A POLICE MAN ARE MATHS AND ENGLISH O LEVELS ,4OTHER O LEVELS. THE HAYWARDS HEATH POLICE CLOSES AT 10 P.M. AND BURGESS HILL TAKES OVER.IN HAYWARDS HEATH THERE ARE 3 SHIFTS EACH EIGHT HOURS LONG. ALL OVER NIGHT PRISONERS GO TO BURGESS HILL BECAUSE HAYWARDS MHEATH IS CLOSED.
